 Please jawab mau dikumpulin nanti aku follow dan aku jadikan jawaban yang tercerdas jangan ngasal ya jawab nya

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A rhyme is a repetition of similar sounds (usually, exactly the same sound) in the final stressed syllables and any following syllables of two or more words. Rhyming words have different beginning sounds, but have the same vowel and ending sounds, for example: cat/sat/pat/hat, spin/fin/chin/pin, etc.

Penjelasan:

Hope this helps sorry if I'm wrong.

Make it the smartest yes ;).

related_questions.question:
1. If I... (to study), I... (to pass) ... the exam    C. Studied - will study
A. Study - would study X
B. Study - will study
D. Studied - would have studied
2. If the sun ... (to shine), we... (to walk) into town
C. Shines - will shine
A. Shine - would shine
D. Shone - would have shone
B. Shine - will shine
(to see the doctor
3. If he ... (to have) a temperature, he
A. Have - will see
C. Had - will see
B. Has - will see
D. Having - will see
4. If you (go)... by bike more often, you (be/not).. so flabby
A Go - would not be
B. Went - would not be
C. Goes - would not be
D. Going would not be​

2. If the sun shines, we will walk into town

3. If he has a temperature, he will see the doctor. (textnya qkira kira aja cz klimat g lngkap)

4. B

related_questions.question: Bandingkan gambar diatas menggunakan teks bahasa Inggris koperatif dan superlatif!​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Degrees of Comparison:

1. A donkey is bigger than a turtle and a snail. (Comparative Degree)

2. A snail is smaller than a turtle and a donkey. (Comparative Degree)

3. The donkey has the biggest body in the picture. (Superlative Degree)

4. The snail is the smallest animal in the picture. (Superlative degree)

Penjelasan:

Comparative degree dibentuk dengan menambahkan akhiran "-er" dan menambahkan more ... than jika kata sifatnya terdiri lebih dari satu suku kata.

Contoh : Tony is younger than i am. (Tony lebih muda dariku)

I think Book A is more interesting than Book B.

Superlative degree dengan menambahkan akhiran "-est" the most jika kata sifat terdiri lebih dari 2 suku kata dan memiliki arti sebagai yang paling sehingga tidak bisa dibandingkan lagi.

Contoh : I am the youngest person in my family. (Aku adalah orang termuda / yang paling muda di dalam keluargaku)

Last night my brother told me the most interesting story that i have ever heard

Semoga membantu ya.

4. The best arrangement of these jumbled sentences to be a good recount text is....    a. Finally I went home with my friends happily.
b.After swimming, I put on again my bathing suit and go to the bathroom to rinse my body.
c. Yesterday I went to swimming pool with my friends.
d.I brought my bag which is full of things I needed in the swimming pool.
e.I wore my clothes and put all the wet clothes into the plastic bag, so my bag would not get wet by water.
f. When we arrived there, I changed my clothes into swimsuit then I did a little warming up before I got into the pool.
A. C-d-f-e-b-a
B. a-c-b-d-f-e
C. d-c-b-f-a-e-
D. b-d-a-f-e-​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

c-d-f-b-e-a
